topic.title: TCP DP AUX Retimer MUX With Barlow Ridge Topology

fig.title: TCP DP AUX Retimer MUX With Barlow Ridge Topology Diagram

image.href: FIG_tcp dp aux retimer mux with barlow ridge topology diagram_1.png

table.title: TCP DP AUX Retimer MUX With Barlow Ridge Topology Notes

entry.p: No explicit limit, use best known routing practices.
Reference planes can be continuous ground or continuous power that have low frequency peak to peak noise. Ground referencing is preferred.
Refer to USB4 ESD approved list in Barlow Ridge Host Router (BR HR) collateral.
MUX retimer should be vesa compliant.
An edge rate reduction mechanism such as a 47 pF capacitor (Cs) terminated to VSS is recommended. Cs cap is optional.

section.title: Rx,Tx, Post-Channel
section.p: Max Length Total Note: Refer to the Retimer MUX and Barlow Ridge documentation to establish the maximum allowable routing length.

section.title: Rx,Tx, Pre-Channel
